languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} убивает противника, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, все союзники охотника за головами в радиусе 7 клеток от цели получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели охотника за головами</u>% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter kills an enemy with a critical hit, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>2×(target's difficulty tier)%</u> critical hit chance until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the Hunter kills an enemy with a critical hit, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>(2 × target's difficulty tier)</u>% critical hit chance until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the Hunter kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g})</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} убивает противника, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, все союзники охотника за головами в радиусе 7 клеток от цели получают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели охотника за головами</u>% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда охотник убивает противника, совершая критическое попадание, все союзники охотника в радиусе 7 клеток от цели получают +<u>(2 × уровень сложности цели)</u>% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

Когда охотник убивает противника, совершая критическое попадание, все союзники охотника в радиусе 7 клеток от цели получают +<u>(2 × уровень сложности цели)</u>% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}通过{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}击杀敌人时，目标周围7格范围内的所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率都会提高<u>（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人通过{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}击杀敌人时，目标周围7格范围内的所有盟友的暴击率都会提高<u>（2×目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mate a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, todos los aliados situados en un radio de 7 casillas alrededor del objetivo ganan un +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo)</u> % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mate a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, todos los aliados situados en un radio de 7 casillas alrededor del objetivo ganan un +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo)</u> % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} tötet, erhalten alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 7 Feldern um das Ziel +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Ziels)</u> % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} tötet, erhalten alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 7 Feldern um das Ziel +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Ziels)</u> % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} élimine un ennemi en lui portant un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, tous les alliés situés dans un rayon de 7 cases autour de la cible bénéficient de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Chasseur élimine un ennemi en lui portant un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, tous les alliés situés dans un rayon de 7 cases autour de la cible bénéficient de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible)</u> % de chances d'infliger un coup critique jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が敵を{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で撃破した時、ターゲットの周囲7セル以内のすべての味方は、戦闘終了までクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が+<u>(ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%される。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, all allies in a 7-cell radius around the target gain +<u>target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが敵を{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で撃破した時、ターゲットの周囲7セル以内のすべての味方は、戦闘終了までクリティカル率が+<u>(2 × ターゲットの {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g})</u>%される。この効果は累積する。
